com.samsung.android.sdk.pen.settingui

Class SpenSettingTextLayout

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.View
      • android.view.ViewGroup
        • android.widget.LinearLayout
          • com.samsung.android.sdk.pen.settingui.SpenSettingTextLayout
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Drawable.Callback, AccessibilityEventSource, KeyEvent.Callback, ViewManager, ViewParent

    public class SpenSettingTextLayout
extends LinearLayout
    Text Setting View class
    Since:
    3.0.0

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SpenSettingTextLayout(Context context, String customImagePath, HashMap<String,String> fontName, RelativeLayout relativeLayout)
      Text Setting Layout does not support (RTL) Right To Left mirroring, therefore, please set layout direction View.LAYOUT_DIRECTION_LTR for its parent view so that SDK can have normal display and operation.
      SpenSettingTextLayout(Context context, String customImagePath, HashMap<String,String> fontName, RelativeLayout relativeLayout, float ratio)
      Creates an SpenSettingTextLayout instance with the specified image path, font name, relative layout, and ratio.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SpenSettingTextLayout

        public SpenSettingTextLayout(Context context,
                     String customImagePath,
                     HashMap<String,String> fontName,
                     RelativeLayout relativeLayout)
        Text Setting Layout does not support (RTL) Right To Left mirroring, therefore, please set layout direction View.LAYOUT_DIRECTION_LTR for its parent view so that SDK can have normal display and operation.
        Creates an SpenSettingTextLayout instance with the specified image path, font name, and relative layout. The following parameters must be not null.
        Parameters:
        context - [in] The Context for application.
        customImagePath - [in] The path to the image you want to use internally (String).
        fontName - [in] The font list.
        relativeLayout - [in] The upper of the Layout.
        Since:
        3.0.0

      • SpenSettingTextLayout

        public SpenSettingTextLayout(Context context,
                     String customImagePath,
                     HashMap<String,String> fontName,
                     RelativeLayout relativeLayout,
                     float ratio)
        Creates an SpenSettingTextLayout instance with the specified image path, font name, relative layout, and ratio. The following parameters must be not null.
        Parameters:
        context - [in] The Context for application.
        customImagePath - [in] The path to the image you want to use internally (String).
        fontName - [in] The font list.
        relativeLayout - [in] The upper of the Layout.
        ratio - [in] The overall size adjusting ratio (must be greater than 0). If ratio is larger than 2.0f, it will be set to 2.0f.
        Throws:
        OutOfMemoryError - If ratio is too large, bitmap size exceeds VM budget. Therefore, please consider your ratio carefully, bitmaps can quickly consume your available memory budget leading to an application crash due to the dreaded exception.
        Since:
        3.0.0

    • Method Detail

      • close

        public void close()
        Close the Settings UI. Call this method before destroying the instance to prevent memory leaks.
        Since:
        3.0.0

      • setIndicatorPosition

        public void setIndicatorPosition(int position)
        Set the specified position for the popup indicator.
        Parameters:
        position - The X coordinate of the popup indicator in pixels. If X is less than 0, indicator will be inVisible. If X is greater than setting layout's width, indicator will show on the right side of setting layout.
        Since:
        3.0.0

      • setPosition

        public void setPosition(int x,
               int y)
        Set the specified position for the popup.
        Parameters:
        x - The X coordinate of the popup in pixels.
        y - The Y coordinate of the popup in pixels.
        Since:
        3.0.0

      • getViewMode

        public int getViewMode()
        Get the current view mode.
        Returns:
        mViewMode [in] The current view mode. The valid values are: VIEW_MODE_NORMAL, VIEW_MODE_MINIMUM, VIEW_MODE_MINIMUM_WITHOUT_PREVIEW, VIEW_MODE_STYLE, VIEW_MODE_COLOR, VIEW_MODE_PARAGRAPH
        Since:
        3.0.0

      • setViewMode

        Parameters:

        Since:
        3.0.0

      • setInfo

        public void setInfo(SpenSettingTextInfo settingInfo)
        Set the specified text settings information. The UI is refreshed based on these values.
        This API should be called when init Text setting view.
        Parameters:
        settingInfo - The text settings information object. SpenSettingTextInfo
        Since:
        3.0.0
